hadiths.text: It was narrated that Aishah said:"I used to twist the garlands fro the Hadi of the Messenger of Allah and the Hadi would be taken out garlanded, and the Messenger of Allah would stay (with his family) his wives

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُوجِبُ تَقْلِيدُ الْهَدْىِ إِحْرَامًا .
chapter.eng-name: Does Garlanding The Hadi Mean That One is In A state of Ihram?
